definition: Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
Nanshi District, former district of Shanghai, merged into Huangpu District 黃浦區|黄浦区[Huang2 pu3 qu1] in 2000
Shashi district of Jingzhou city 荊州市|荆州市[Jing1 zhou1 shi4], Hubei
Xishi District of Yingkou City 營口市|营口市[Ying2 kou3 shi4], Liaoning

sentences.english: Mr. Brown owns the amber anhydrates in the city belfry.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生領有鬧市區塔裏的棕色毛巾。

sentences.english: The magnetic-levitation train ride from the international airport to the city is the perfect metaphor for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 從國際機場到市區的磁懸浮列車線是上海的最佳名片。

sentences.english: The education and teaching research results of the school won lots of award from district, municipal, provincial and state government.
sentences.chinese: 教育教學研究成果多次榮獲國家及省市區的獎勵。

sentences.english: The construction of high-speed railway in city will have profound influence on the city development.
sentences.chinese: 高速鐵路市區段的建設對城市的發展將產生深遠影響。

sentences.english: Is that why I appear to be in downtown Fallujah behind the wheel of an up-armored Humvee?
sentences.chinese: 所以我在費盧傑市區，跟在一輛全副武裝的悍馬後面？

sentences.english: But today in our cities and suburbs, neighboring is not common.
sentences.chinese: 但如今在市區或者市郊，比鄰而居並不常見。

sentences.english: That's because tens of thousands of honey bees have invaded downtown Pittsfield.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲數以萬計的蜜蜂入侵了皮茨菲爾德市區。

sentences.english: Home at the place far away from downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 把總部設在遠離鬧市區的地方。

sentences.english: D. ). The city is divided into 9 parts. The streets are broad and neat.
sentences.chinese: 城內分爲9個市區，街道寬闊平整，規劃整齊。

sentences.english: I walked down the hill into town, ignoring the flashes of lightning all round me.
sentences.chinese: 我顧不上一路的電閃雷鳴，沿着山路向市區走去。

sentences.english: Qiandao Lake from Hangzhou urban district 129kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 千島湖距離杭州市區129公里。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang worked in an Internet bar.
sentences.chinese: 據瞭解，汪先生在市區一家網吧內當網管。

sentences.english: Delivery is free of charge within the Beijing area.
sentences.chinese: 北京市區送貨是免費的。

sentences.english: Not to loiter downtown in ice cream stores.
sentences.chinese: 不準在鬧市區的冰激凌店閒逛。

sentences.english: The average elevation of urban area is 29m.
The downtown streets are extremely broad. Booths and maple trees are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 市區的街道及其寬闊，到處都是售貨亭和楓樹。
